title: Understanding the Ribbon
text: The ribbon in software applications is a user interface element that organizes commands into tabs. It helps users find and use the features they need quickly and efficiently.

title: Why Customize?
text: Customizing the ribbon allows users to add or remove commands based on their preferences or needs, making it easier to access frequently used features.

hintAnswer: some commands do not display automatically
title: Identifying the Reason
text: Why might someone want to customize the ribbon in a software application?
choices: some commands do not display automatically
some data does not display automatically
this is seen as a more professional view
